articles.title: Greetings to Grand Duc of Luxembourg
articles.content:
Greetings to Grand Duc of Luxembourg 
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Henri, grand duc of Luxembourg, on Tuesday on the occasion of its national day. 
					 The message wished Luxembourg development and prosperity.

articles.title: DPRK FM Spokesman Accuses Hostile Forces of Setting up Anti-DPRK "Human Rights Office"
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman Accuses Hostile Forces of Setting up Anti-DPRK "Human Rights Office"
						
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry issued the following statement Tuesday:
					 The dishonest hostile forces are getting extremely reckless and provocative in their moves to tarnish the dignity and image of the DPRK and bring down its ideology and social system at any cost under the pretext of non-existent "human rights issue."
					
					 The hostile forces finally set up the ghost-like "UN office of human rights" in south Korea despite the DPRK's repeated warnings and strong protest of different countries and their people.
					
					 This is a hideous politically-motivated provocation challenging the dignity and social system of the DPRK and a criminal act of escalating tensions on the Korean peninsula and in the region and inciting confrontation under the pretext of "protecting human rights."
					
					 The hostile forces are advertising the establishment of the "office" was pursuant to the "resolution" of the UN Human Rights Council but they can never cover up their true colors as plot-breeders.
					
					 The DPRK categorically opposed and rejected the "human rights resolution" railroaded through the 25th meeting of the UN Human Rights Council in March last year as it was a product of the U.S. vicious hostile policy toward the DPRK. The DPRK, therefore, never recognizes the "office" set up, pursuant to the "resolution."
					
					  The DPRK vehemently condemns the ruckus of setting up the "office" in Seoul as another form of the anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign launched by the hostile forces seized with the inveterate repugnance towards the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities have turned south Korea into a tundra of human rights by invoking the "Security Law" and other evil laws. It is the height of impudence for them to have taken the lead in setting up such "office", talking volumes about the "human rights issue" in the DPRK. 
					
					They allowed the setting up of the "office" in Seoul though no country in the world dared do so. This is an anachronistic behavior and a grave provocation pushing the inter-Korean confrontation to an extreme phase contrary to the desire of all Koreans for improved inter-Korean relations.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that the "office" is no more than a center for gathering misinformation cooked up by "defectors from the north" and other riff-raffs to earn money as it is set to implement the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK from A to Z.
					
					 It is ridiculous, indeed, for the U.S. and other hostile forces to work hard to save the anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign from bankruptcy by patronizing the human scum who eke out their living through false propaganda.
					
					 It is no more than a daydream for them to try to do harm to the DPRK standing highly dignified for its independence and Songun by employing such base means and methods as setting up the "office".
					
					 The DPRK will decisively foil the reckless "human rights" racket against the DPRK through resolute toughest counteractions.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Gift from Russian Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Gift from Russian Personages
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by Byacheslav Goncharov, editor-in-chief of the organ of the Maritime Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, and his party on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was conveyed to an official concerned by the editor-in-chief on Tuesday.

articles.title: People Vow to Take Revenge upon U.S. Aggressors
articles.content:
People Vow to Take Revenge upon U.S. Aggressors
						
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Meetings of youth and students and women separately took place on Tuesday to vow to take revenge upon the U.S. aggressors with the approach of June 25, the day of struggle against U.S. imperialism. 
					 Present at the meetings were officials of the youth league and the women's union and officials concerned, youth and students, members of the women's union and persons who either experienced or witnessed the bestial atrocities committed by the U.S. imperialists and class enemies during the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					
					 A meeting of youth and students took place in the Compound of the National House of Class Education. 
					
					 The floor was taken by a lecturer of the house to be followed by others.
					
					 They recalled that the U.S. imperialists ignited a war of aggression in Korea 65 years ago, bringing horrible disasters and misfortunes to the Koreans.
					
					 The young people are filled with the will to take revenge upon the enemies, they said, and went on:
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists impose another war upon the Korean people, they will blow up the stronghold of the enemies and bring about the victory in confrontation with the U.S.
					
					 A meeting of members of the women's union took place in front of the Sinchon Museum. Kim Jong Sun, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the women's union, made a report which was followed by speeches. 
					
					 They recalled during the period of temporary strategic retreat of the Korean People's Army the U.S. aggressors perpetrated such monstrous atrocities as brutally killing over 35 000 patriots and other people in Sinchon County or a quarter of its population in less than two months.
					
					 Illusion about the U.S. imperialists and class enemies leads to death and it is necessary, therefore, to mercilessly punish the enemies with arms only, they declared, adding this is the bitter lesson taught by Sinchon. They vowed to force the enemies to pay a thousand-fold dearer price for the blood shed by the people of Sinchon.

articles.title: GFTUK Officials, Members Tour Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
GFTUK Officials, Members Tour Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu
 Samjiyon, June 23 (KCNA) -- Officials and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) toured the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu from June 15 to 23 on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung at the Monument to the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo, Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site, Chongbong Bivouac and Monument to the Victorious Battle in Musan Area and on the shore of Lake Samji and before the mosaics depicting the three commanders of Mt. Paektu at the secret camp on Mt. Paektu.
					
					 They left Hyesan for Pochonbo where they looked round the command post of Pochonbo battle, post office, sub-county office, fire station and police post.
					
					 After their arrival at Lake Samji, they went round the Samjiyon Grand Monument.
					
					 They marched along the Kapsan-Musan guard road to visit the Monument to the Victorious Battle in Musan Area. Then they climbed the top of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 They looked round the historical mementoes preserved at Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp.
					
					 They held an oath-taking meeting there. They visited Chongbong Bivouac and Konchang Bivouac.
					
					 During the tour they conducted diverse political and cultural activities.

articles.title: Spies of S. Korean Intelligence Service Tried in DPRK
articles.content:
Spies of S. Korean Intelligence Service Tried in DPRK
Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- The Supreme Court of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on Tuesday held a trial on Kim Kuk Gi and Choe Chun Gil, spies of south Korea's Intelligence Service who were arrested while perpetrating espionage against the DPRK under the manipulation of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime.
					Citizens of various strata were present as observers.
					
					The justice examined the cases of Kim and Choe, accused of violations of Articles 60, 64, 65 and 221 of the DPRK Criminal Code. Written indictments verifying their crimes were submitted before an inquiry into the facts of the cases.
					
					In the course of the inquiry, the accused confessed to all crimes they had committed by taking active part in the state-sponsored political terrorism and anti-DPRK hostility of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime. The crimes included gathering of information on the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its party, state and military secrets and situation and offering of them to south Korea's Intelligence Service and manufacturing and distributing copies of anti-DPRK multimedia.
					
					Displayed at the trial were varieties of spy apparatuses, memories with undesirable contents stored and other evidence pieces proving the crimes of the accused.
					
					The prosecutor in his final speech demanded death penalty to the accused, contending that they are bound to face a stern punishment under the DPRK law as they committed the hideous state-sponsored terrorism against the dignified supreme leadership of the DPRK and encroached on the security of its socialist system and state.
					
					 The defense counsel asked the court to commute the death penalty to other punishment, saying in his argument that the crimes by the accused and their consequences are very serious but the accused may repent of their faults more bitterly, witnessing for themselves the true picture of the prospering DPRK.
					
					 The court condemned Kim Kuk Gi and Choe Chun Gil respectively to a penalty of indefinite compulsory labor.

articles.title: Long-Distance Belt Conveyor of Unryul Mine
articles.content:
Long-Distance Belt Conveyor of Unryul Mine
						
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- The Unryul Mine, an iron ore producer in the west coastal area of the DPRK, boasts of a long-distance belt conveyor.
					 The 4 600 meter-long conveyor was built between Kumsanpho and Nunggum Islet in a short period of six months in June Juche 64 (1975) on the initiative of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Since then, tens of millions of waste ore have been poured into the sea, linking several islets to the mainland and thus exposing more than 4 700 hectares of tideland. And the tideland has been reclaimed into farms and salterns, which are making great contribution to improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 A pickled-fish processing factory is now under construction on Nunggum Islet. And thick forest was created along the road on the embankment linking Kwail County, South Hwanghae Province.
					
					 Now it has been pushed forward to modernize the long-distance belt conveyor.

articles.title: Kamhong-ro, Famous Liquor of Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kamhong-ro, Famous Liquor of Pyongyang
						
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- From olden times, Pyongyang has been celebrated for Kamhong-ro (liquor) as well as Pyongyang noodle, mullet soup and other its indigenous foods.
					  Referring to the history of this famous liquor and how to distil it, Kim Ji Won, section chief of the Folklore Institute under the Academy of Social Sciences of the DPRK, told KCNA:
					
					 Kamhong-ro is made of red yeast and jujube, dried persimmon, apple, pear and other sweeteners. The red filtered liquor is generally 40% in alcoholic content, and gives fragrant flavor without pungency.
					
					 The method of brewing Kamhong-ro was registered as one of the national intangible heritages.

articles.title: Minju Joson Terms Japan's Revision of Security Bills Political Suicide
articles.content:
Minju Joson Terms Japan's Revision of Security Bills Political Suicide 
						
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- The three witnesses who had been invited to be present at the recent constitutional deliberation at the House of Representatives of Japan in the capacity of legal experts were unanimous in expressing their views that the revision of the security bills for allowing the exercise of the "right to collective self-defense" was unconstitutional. Meanwhile, at least 261 050 Japanese citizens signed papers in protest against the revision of the bills and more than 25 000 Japanese encircled the Diet Building on June 14, strongly protesting against the present government's moves to revise the security bills.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Tuesday says the strong protest made by the broad public of Japan against the government's attempt to revise the bills goes to prove their disagreement with the government's view on the country's security matter.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 If the proposed revision of the security bills is aimed at protecting Japan's security and ensuring peace and stability in the region as claimed by the present Japanese ruling forces, there will be no reason for the Japanese to oppose it so strongly.
					
					 The Japanese people had already suffered too much from the past war of aggression.
					
					 It is the wild ambition of the Japanese ultra-right conservative politicians that they can realize the old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere" only through a war.
					
					 The sinister intention of the Japanese reactionaries to deceive the people and drive them into meaningless death is no longer workable.
					
					 It is the public mindset of Japan that its people should not be allowed to fall victim to another war as the revision of the security bills means a political suicide.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Deplores S. Korean Society Full of Falsity
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Deplores S. Korean Society Full of Falsity 
						
  Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Kyunghyang Daily News of south Korea on June 19 carried an editorial deploring the reality of the south Korean society full of falsity. 
					  The editorial noted that MERS cases for the past one month clearly proved what is the problem of the south Korean society. 
					
					 The vulnerable anti-epidemic services and the incompetence of the "government" are problems, but a more serious matter is lack of confidence among the "government" and hospitals, patients and protectors, it said, and went on:
					
					 What was most clearly manifested was the practice of telling lies. Deceiving each other, south Korean society is seized with increasing fear and MERS spread has become worse. 
					
					 The reality goes to prove that a society without confidence and solidarity may collapse because of disease.

articles.title: Paper of Koreans in U.S. Demands Resignation of Present S. Korean Chief Executive
articles.content:
Paper of Koreans in U.S. Demands Resignation of Present S. Korean Chief Executive
						
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- An article demanding the resignation of the present south Korean chief executive was posted on Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., on June 21.
					 Recalling that the reality of south Korea is deplorable, the article noted that when asked why it is in such mayhem, overseas Koreans were unanimous in answering this awful reality was attributable to the fact that the present regime is not a legitimate one.
					
					The days of the south Korean regime are numbered, the article noted, and went on:
					
					Therefore, distrust in the chief executive was manifested even among conservative controversialists.
					
					 The chief executive has prolonged her remaining days with the backing of the U.S. hegemonic forces but the public began turning its back on her.
					
					 The chief executive should step down now as she would bring bigger misfortune.

articles.title: Brief Biography of Kim Jong Il Posted by Romanian Party on Its Website
articles.content:
Brief Biography of Kim Jong Il Posted by Romanian Party on Its Website
						
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- A brief biography of leader Kim Jong Il was posted by the Socialist Party of Romania on its website on June 16.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreign Figures
  Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Events were held in different countries to mark the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 15th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					  They included meeting, Korean photo and book exhibition and film shows in Cuba, Norway and Switzerland on June 12 and 13.
					
					  Displayed at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					  Also displayed there were their works, and photos and books introducing successes achieved by the army and people of the DPRK in building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					  The participants in the film shows watched Korean films "Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum" and "Masikryong Ski Resort".
					
					 Juan Jose Leon Vega, first vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, said that Kim Jong Il organized and led the politics, economy, culture, military and other overall affairs of the country after starting his work at the Party Central Committee.
					
					 Dag Norum, chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway, said that Kim Jong Il frustrated the moves to stifle the DPRK by the U.S.-imperialist allied forces, defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country and nation and provided a firm foundation for building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Political Figures of Bulgaria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Political Figures of Bulgaria
						
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Comrade Kim Jong Il's feats will be immortal.
					 Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, said this in a statement on June 12 on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The most important significance of Kim Jong Il's exploit is that he firmly defended socialism from the reckless offensive of the imperialists and renegades of socialism.
					
					 He formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as the integral system of ideology, theory and method of Juche, enriching the treasure house of the Juche idea and making a great contribution to developing the idea and theory of world socialism.
					
					 He also achieved the harmonious whole of the Party and the people and turned socialist Korea into the invincible power that no hostile forces dare provoke by pursuing the unique Songun politics.
					
					 He devoted himself to the struggle for the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Exhibition Opens in Mongolia
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Exhibition Opens in Mongolia
						
  Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- A Kimjongilia exhibition opened with due ceremony in Ulan Bator, Mongolia on June 17 to mark the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					  On display at the exhibition were photos of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					  300 potted Kimjongilias were on show.
					
					  Present at the opening ceremony were personages of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party, Kimjongilia Association of Mongolia, Mongolian Centre for the Study of Juche, Mongolian Association for the Study of Juche Idea-Songun Idea and the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development and masses.
					
					  The international secretary of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party said in a speech that Kim Jong Il wisely led the work for consolidating the unity and cohesion in thinking and purpose since the outset of his work at the WPK Central Committee.
					
					  It is very important for the world progressive political parties to learn from the experience of the WPK, he added.
					
					  The chairman of the Kimjongilia Association of Mongolia said:
					
					 Kimjongilias have been brought into full bloom despite the unfavorable climate in Mongolia to be displayed at the exhibition. This clearly shows how ardently the Mongolian people revere Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We will bring Kimjongilias into fuller bloom.

articles.title: June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Supported by South African, Thai Personages
articles.content:
June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Supported by South African, Thai Personages
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- South African and Thai personages made public statements on June 15, the 15th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 Bonakele Majuba, secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party who doubles as chairman of the South African Association of Friendship and Solidarity with Korean People, said it was proved in practice that the June 15 joint declaration is the most realistic and concrete proposal for achieving Korea's reunification in an independent and peaceful way in the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 Fully supporting the joint declaration, he expressed expectation and belief that the Korean people would surely achieve the historic cause of national reunification under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, noted that it is the unanimous desire of all progressives of the world to see the north and the south of Korea bring about a great turn and changes in the inter-Korean relations through brisk dialogue, negotiation, exchange and contact.

articles.title: Nigerian Body Praises Kim Jong Il's Life
articles.content:
Nigerian Body Praises Kim Jong Il's Life
Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website on June 15 an article titled "Life for future".
					The article said that leader Kim Jong Il, eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, dedicated his all to the prospering, rosy future of the DPRK, true to the intention of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					For the future! This represented his ardent patriotism which characterized his whole life.
					
					He firmly adhered to the principle of attaching greater importance to morrow than the present.
					
					He steered the dynamic drive for the prosperity of the country without moment's standstill and stagnation, bringing about a decisive turn in building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al gran duque de Luxemburgo
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al gran duque de Luxemburgo
Pyongyang, 23 de junio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 23 un mensaje de felicitacion al gran duque de Luxemburgo, Henri, con motivo del Dia Nacional de este pais.
					El remitente desea el desarrollo y la prosperidad de Luxemburgo.

articles.title: Juzgados en RPDC espias de SNI del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Juzgados en RPDC espias de SNI del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 23 de junio (ACNC) -- Se efectuo el dia 23 en el Tribunal Supremo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea el juicio sobre Kim Kuk Gi y Choe Chun Gil, espias del Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea, quienes fueron capturados al cabo de cometer el espionaje anti-RPDC bajo el control de Estados Unidos y la banda titere surcoreana.
					En la ocasion los habitantes de distintas capas participaron en calidad de observadores.
					
					Luego de examinar el registro de pleito de los acusados que corresponde al articulo 60 (crimen de conspiracion contra el Estado), el 64 (crimen de espionaje), el 65 (crimen subversivo y de sabotaje) y el 221 (crimen de acceso ilegal a la frontera), del condigo de la RPDC, se presentaron las actas de acusacion que determinaron los crimenes de los detenidos y hubo la investigacion sobre el caso.
					
					Durante el proceso de investigacion, los acusados reconocieron todos los hechos de que ellos ofrecieron en ultramar al "SNI" los datos relacionados con la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC, los secretos del partido, el Estado y militares y los datos sobre el estado interior, recogidos sistematicamente, y tomaron activa parte en el terrorismo politico estatal y en actos hostiles anti-RPDC de Estados Unidos y la banda titere del Sur de Corea, tales como la fabricacion y difusion de los materiales de propaganda intrigante.
					
					Se exhibieron diversos aparatos de espionaje que confirman los crimenes de los acusados y otros testigos, entre otros las memorias con los multimedios malsanos.
					
					En su argumentacion, el fiscal insistio en que los crimenes cometidos por los acusados deben ser sentenciados debida y severamente segun la ley de la RPDC, al calificarlos como gran terror politico estatal contra la digna Direccion Suprema y una violacion contra la seguridad del regimen socialista y el Estado, y solicito condenarlos a muerte.
					
					En el alegato, el abogado propuso al juicio sentenciar no a la pena de la muerte, propuesta por el acusador, sino a la otra, aunque son muy graves los crimenes de los acusados y sus  consecuencias, para que ellos puedan arrepentirse mas de sus crimenes presenciando personalmente en adelante el aspecto prospero de Corea socialista.
					
					El juicio sentencio a los acusados Kim Kuk Gi y Choe Chun Gil a trabajos reeducativos de tiempo indefinido, respectivamente.
					
					Los crimenes de Kim y Choe, espias del Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea, comprueban que EE.UU. y la banda titere surcoreana son caudillos del terrorismo politico estatal y de artimana y demuestran claramente el destino tragico de quienes se suman a tales maniobras hostiles.

articles.title: Funcionarios y miembros de FGSC recorren zona del monte Paektu
articles.content:
Funcionarios y miembros de FGSC recorren zona del monte Paektu
						
Pyongyang, 23 de junio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 51o aniversario del inicio del trabajo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, los funcionarios y miembros de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea (FGSC) recorrieron desde el dia 15 hasta el 23 los campos de batalla revolucionaria de la zona del monte Paektu.
					Ellos rindieron homenaje postumo al Presidente Kim Il Sung tras colocar cestos y ramos de flores ante sus estatuas de bronce en el Monumento a la Victoria en la Batalla de Pochonbo, en el antiguo lugar de batalla revolucionaria de Pochonbo, en el campamento de Chongbong, en el Obelisco a la Victoria en la Batalla de la Zona de Musan y a la orilla del lago Samji y ante el mural de mosaico con imagenes de los tres generales del monte Paektu instalado en el campamento secreto del monte Paektu.
					
					Al llegar a Pochonbo despues de partir de Hyesan, pasaron revista al puesto de mando de batalla de Pochonbo, la oficina de correos, el ayuntamiento del canton, la estacion de policia y otros lugares.
					
					Ellos recorrieron el Conjunto Monumental de Samjiyon.
					
					Visitaron el Obelisco a la Victoria en la Batalla de la Zona de Musan tras pasar por "carretera Kapsan-Musan para la guarnicion fronteriza" y subio al monte Paektu.
					
					Vieron los objetos historicos conservados en la casa natal del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el campamento secreto del monte Paektu y realizaron el encuentro de juramento en el recito frente a esta casa.
					
					Recorrieron los campamentos secretos de Chongbong, Konchang y otros.
					
					En el periodo del recorrido, desarrollaron diversas actividades politicas y culturales.

articles.title: Actos de juramento de venganza dedicados a dia de lucha antiyanqui-25 de junio
articles.content:
Actos de juramento de venganza dedicados a dia de lucha antiyanqui-25 de junio
						
Pyongyang, 23 de junio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de la lucha antiyanqui-25 de junio, tuvieron lugar el dia 23 los actos de juramento de venganza de los jovenes y estudiantes y las miembros de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea (UMDC), respectivamente.
					Participaron los funcionarios de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, la UMDC y de la rama interesada, los jovenes y estudiantes, las miembros de la UMDC, las personas que experimentaron personalmente o presenciaron directamente las barbaridades bestiales de los imperialistas yanquis y los enemigos clasistas en el periodo de pasada guerra coreana.
					
					　En el acto de juramento de venganza de los jovenes y estudiantes, efectuado en el patio frente al Pabellon Central de Educacion Clasista, hubo palabras de la conferenciante de dicho pabellon e intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores revelaron que hace 65 anos desde ahora los imperialistas yanquis provocaron la guerra de agresion en esta tierra y acarrearon tragicas calamidades y desgracias a la nacion coreana.
					
					Prosiguieron que en esta tierra los vengadores de la nueva generacion redoblan la voluntad de castigar a los enemigos y destacaron que si los imperialistas yanquis les obligan la segunda guerra, aniquilaran el nido de los enemigos y lograran a toda costa la victoria en la batalla de confrontacion antiyanqui.
					
					En el acto de juramento de venganza de las funcionarias y miembros de la UMDC efectuado en el patio frente al Museo de Sinchon, hubo informe de Kim Jong Sun, presidenta de esta entidad y otras intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores condenaron severamente a los agresores imperialistas yanquis que al ocupar el distrito de Sinchon en el periodo de la retirada temporal estrategica, asesinaron bestialmente a mas de 35 mil patriotas y habitantes equivalentes a un cuarto de la poblacion del distrito en menos de dos meses.
					
					Subrayaron que la leccion de sangre sacada en Sinchon es que la ilusion sobre los imperialistas yanquis y los enemigos clasistas es la muerte y hay que hacer balance implacable solo con los fusiles en cuanto a los enemigos.
					
					Y tomaron la decision de cobrar miles de veces el precio de sangre.
